sen.j: 安倍神社（あべじんじゃ）は、岡山県浅口市鴨方町にある神社である。
sen.e: Abe-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kamogata-cho, Asakuchi City, Okayama Prefecture.
Abe-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kamogata-cho, Asakuchi City, Okayama Prefecture.
Abe-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kamogata-cho, Asakuchi City, Okayama Prefecture.

sen.cmt: 人名のハイフンを外しました。

sen.j: 安倍晴明屋敷跡に安倍晴明を祀る祠があった。
sen.e: Abe-jinja Shrine is situated on the site of the residence of ABE-no-Seimei, having Hokora (a small shrine) enshrining him in the precincts.
sen.cmt: 一例文一訳文の例外対処。ウェブを確認し訳しました。「安倍晴明屋敷跡に鎮座する」の内容のようです。
sen.e: On the site of the residence of ABE no Seimei, there has been a Hokora (a small shrine) enshrining him.
sen.cmt: 「一例文一訳文の例外対処」とするため、原文を修正し、訳を変更しました。人名のハイフンを外しました。
sen.e: On the site of the residence of ABE no Seimei, there has been a Hokora (a small shrine) enshrining him.

sen.j: 昭和17年に阿部山 (岡山県)を開墾するために入植した人々によって建立された。
sen.e: The shrine was established in 1942 by the settlers aiming to reclaim Mt. Abe (in Okayama Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 一例文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The shrine was established in 1942 by the settlers aiming to reclaim Mt. Abe (in Okayama Prefecture).
The shrine was established in 1942 by the settlers aiming to reclaim Mt. Abe (in Okayama Prefecture).

sen.j: 境内には社殿、安倍晴明屋敷跡、晴明大権現の祠などがある。
sen.e: In the precincts, there are a temple building, the site of the residence of ABE-no-Seimei, Hokora enshrining Seimei Daigongen (the Great Avatar of Seimei), etc.
In the precincts, there are a temple building, the site of the residence of ABE no Seimei, Hokora enshrining Seimei Daigongen (the Great Avatar of Seimei), and so on.
sen.cmt: 人名のハイフンを外しました。用語統一リストに従い、「など」をand so onに変更しました。
sen.e: In the precincts, there are a temple building, the site of the residence of ABE no Seimei, Hokora enshrining Seimei Daigongen (the Great Avatar of Seimei), and so on.
